job_description:
Join us as an Accounts Receivable Intern to support the Finance team in managing billing, payments, and AR documentation. Your responsibilities will include:

1. Assisting with invoice preparation, payment recording, and updating customer accounts.
2. Supporting follow-ups on outstanding payments and helping resolve basic billing issues.
3. Helping reconcile AR records, monitor transactions, and organize related documents.
4. Assisting with simple reporting, month-end tasks, and general administrative support.

This role is ideal for students or fresh graduates seeking hands-on experience in accounting, billing, and financial operations.
